programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his familys massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: Love at First Lie
programme.desc: An ordinary, cheerful and kind-hearted girl Bao, meets a troubled rich guy Edward by chance one summer. To ruin his fathers remarriage plans, Edward hires Bao and her friend to sabotage the wedding and that is how Bao and Edward meet and fall in love. All seems well for the sweet couple until their love quickly takes an unexpected turn

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Dailys Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddys career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kongs Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: WE12
programme.desc: An underground organization, The League of Kaito has been maintaining international order. While 12 elite members possess extraordinary skills and have worked independently for a period of time, they must rekindle their long-lost team spirit to accomplish a mission together to save the world from disaster.

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Coffin Homes
programme.desc: Three bizarre tales intertwine in this horror satire set against the housing crisis of Hong Kong, where soaring property prices have driven dwellers to take every insane effort necessary to secure a cramped space, even if it means sharing the same roof with the dead!

programme.title: Chinese Odyssey 2002
programme.desc: Set in Ming Dynasty, young Emperor Zheng De escapes from the palace with his sister who disguised as a man. They run into a notorious wanderer who runs a restaurant with his boyish sister in Jiang Nan. The two pairs of siblings from vastly different social classes descend into an inescapable swirl of gender confusion, slapstick antics and love.

programme.title: My Country, My Parents
programme.desc: Set in 4 different eras in China, the 4-part anthology about home and country is directed by Wu Jing, Zhang Zi Yi, Xu Zheng and Shen Teng, who also star in their own story. The movie depicts how the fathers forge ahead through the struggle of times, defending strong family ties and passing on the fighting spirit through generations.

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: A group of bounty hunters, including San, Yo, Cat, Swan and Bobo, are tasked to track down the culprit of a series of bombings that have plagued an international hotel group. Unfortunately, Swan, Cat and Bobo are kidnapped by the mastermind of the bombings. Can San and Yo save them? Will the bounty hunters accomplish their mission?

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yu into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Caos enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Beis concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: Due to the negligence of sharp-tongued barrister Adrian, his innocent client is convicted of murder and sentenced to 17 years in jail. An opportunity to appeal the case and free his client arises a few years later, but in order to right his wrong, he must fight against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong for justice to prevail.

programme.title: The Comeback
programme.desc: Uncle Hua is a retired agent who owns an antique shop on an old street. When the old street is forcibly demolished by the local Green Dragon Gang one day, Uncle Huas hidden identity is accidentally revealed, and he is pursued by a mysterious organization headed by Ah Jie. A fatal duel has just begun!

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Xiao Rus financial analysis for a bank client was stolen online. A ransom has to be paid within three days or else the document would be disclosed. To protect the clients data, the company brings in the police to investigate. In the meantime, an analyst disappears and the Technical Director resigns. Is there a bigger crisis lurking behind?

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderellas adventure has just begun!

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Mr Lin and Miss Wang are the two top bounty hunters in the business, and are searching for the destructive missile Hand of God to prove who is the better bounty hunter. They soon realize they are not the only ones after the missile. Will Lin and Wang put their differences aside and work together in search for the Hand of God?

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: This crime comedy is about a bumbling young man Fang Nan, who kidnaps a middle-aged businessman Zhang Cheng Gong for ransom. However, the captor becomes the captive when Zhang turns the tables on Fang and forces him to complete three tasks. The two men soon find themselves sharing a journey filled with absurdity and deception.

programme.title: Binding Souls
programme.desc: Five old friends revisit their school before it closes down to find records of paranormal existence, including the mysterious case of a missing student. The school was previously occupied by the Japanese for various human experiments and is known to be haunted. Can the five friends get out of the school safely?

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xings son attempts drug trafficking to save his fathers studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: Fall in Love at First Kiss
programme.desc: In this romantic love story starring Taiwanese actors Darren Wang and Jelly Lin, an ordinary girl develops a stubborn crush on the school genius after an unexpected kiss. But with the genius adored by everyone in the school, can their relationship blossom and develop?

programme.title: City Under Siege
programme.desc: When circus clown Sunny gets transformed into a super-powered mutant, he finds himself pitted against his fellow circus performers who were altered in the same accident, and who are now using their powers to wreak havoc around the city.

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asias top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the Gang of Five in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: WE12
programme.desc: An underground organization, The League of Kaito has been maintaining international order. While 12 elite members possess extraordinary skills and have worked independently for a period of time, they must rekindle their long-lost team spirit to accomplish a mission together to save the world from disaster.

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from real events. Detective Lin sets up a special unit to arrest the motorbike robber and the crime syndicate behind the thefts in Foshan. In the process, his pregnant wife is hit by a motorbike robber, leading him to uncover their revenge plan...

programme.title: 97 Aces Go Places
programme.desc: Hao Shi becomes the new triad boss after his father is killed by the pretty swindler, Ling. While professional gunman Drunken Gun is tasked to help Hao Shi take revenge, Ling is hunted by gangster Lei, from whom she has conned 2 million dollars. In the process, Hao Shi and Drunken Gun accidentally arrest Lei instead...

programme.title: Martial Club
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung and his friend Wang Yin Lin offend the young master of another rival school and the expert they hire, causing both martial arts schools to fight against each other. This is Director Liu Chia Liangs masterpiece and one of the top ten highest grossing movies in 1981.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Gao Jian is the disciple of the martial arts master Shi but is constantly being punished by his master for no reason. One day, Gao accidentally saves his masters rival Jin, so Jin teaches him his unique martial arts skill in return. However, Master Shi sees this as Gaos betrayal

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperors sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: Five Tough Guys
programme.desc: A titular gang of misfits come together to protect a patriotic general from a scheming usurper. To this end, the unlikely heroes act as the generals escorts on a dangerous journey to a distant British consulate, beset by enemies and sinister Japanese interference along the way.

programme.title: Till The End Of Time
programme.desc: This is Jenny Hu's stunning debut as a struggling singer who tries to keep her career and marriage intact. This movie also includes seven memorable hit songs.

programme.title: Brave Archer And His Mate
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong raise the son of his sworn brother Yang Kang and named him Yang Guo. To prevent Yang Guo from taking revenge for his fathers death, Huang Rong bans him from learning martial arts. Yang Guo runs away from home in anger and encounters Ouyang Feng, who teaches him the Toad Stance and accidentally unveils his true identity

programme.title: Woman Of The Night
programme.desc: The movie offers three stories of love and obsession. In the first tale, a young student with a voyeuristic habit spies on two of his female roommates. The second story follows an office manager who develops an infatuation for his secretary. The last story is a complex family drama about a debilitated father who forces his family to leave him.

programme.title: Godfather Of Canton
programme.desc: A docker, Lin Si Hai, accidentally saves Commissioner Cheng who then offers him a position in the police force. Lin is smart and soon rises through the ranks through treachery and corruption, before becoming a gangster.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Changs. On the Changs farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, they are kept apart as she is engaged to another man. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperors death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: Dirty Ho
programme.desc: Master Wang, who is actually the 11th prince, poses as an antique connoisseur to hide his true identity. When he meets Dirty Ho, a witty con artist, Wang knows he has found the right man to help him untangle a royal succession plot...

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: The Battle Wizard
programme.desc: Dali Prince Tuan Yu knows nothing about martial arts, but leaves the palace for the martial arts world. He meets a snake sorceress and his mysterious half-sister. Through various misadventures, Tuan Yu gains invincible power by sucking the cobras blood and swallowing the magic toad, eventually defeating his fathers old rival.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: Killer Darts
programme.desc: A group of bandits raided the village where dart master Liu lives and killed his wife. While hunting them down, Lius disciple kills a farmer and his wife when she refuses his advances, leading Liu to adopt their orphaned daughter and raises her with his son. Years later, the daughter meets a man with the bandits and is tricked to go against Liu.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wens brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wens home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: The Black Lizard
programme.desc: Young swordsman Lung Fei encounters strange omens portending the death of his fianc. His enquiries with the help of Chief Constable Tieh Hu reveal an astounding story, in this tale of men and women struggling to save their true loves.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: Killer Constable
programme.desc: Kuei Chih-hung was famous for his modern day crime thrillers, his horror flicks, and even his comedies. But if the only kung-fu film he ever made was this one, hed still be spoken of with respect by even the most ardent martial arts movie fan. Many consider this real life martial arts champion Chen Kuan-tais best performance. As a deeply, even obsessively, dedicated Chief Court Constable, he illuminates the screen with fighting skill and emotional passion. Award winning actor Ku Feng is his equal, playing an especially homicidal robber-chief who thinks nothing of throwing all his men at their relentless pursuer. Lu Tsun and Huang Pei-chi choreograph the many battles featuring such action stalwarts as Pai Piao and Ai Fei.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demons clutches.

programme.title: Bloody Parrot
programme.desc: A swordsman is suspected of being the thief of a treasure sent to Emperor. Through his investigation, he is led on to the trail of the supernatural Bloody Parrot. Poisonous things happen including a demonic possession, witches casting poison spells and disgusting autopsies. Then a dead constable turns into a vampire!

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Ah Chiao, a village girl stranded in the city, befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are poor but happy, though Ah Chiaos fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she soon learns that money cannot buy one happiness...

programme.title: The Water Margin
programme.desc: This is a martial arts epic directed by Chang Cheh. In the Sung Dynasty, the government is run by corrupt officials, so Sung Jiang gathers 108 outlaws at Mount Liang and establishes a band of patriotic heroes to end the repression of brutal overlords.

programme.title: Masked Avengers
programme.desc: Masked killers are wreaking havoc and instilling terror with their vicious weapons of choice: razor-sharp, gut-shattering tridents. Only three fearless fighters dare investigate, leading to mass murder and magnificent martial arts. Chien Hsiao-hou, future co-star of Yuen Woo-ping's THE TAI-CHI MASTER joins the trio to get tri-pierced. The core "Venoms" themselves handle the intricate, always impressive, sometimes awe-inspiring, choreography in this unforgettable exercise in "grand guignol kung-fu."

programme.title: The House Of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: Secret Service Of The Imperial Court
programme.desc: Zhao Bu Fan is the sergeant of the governments secret police. Wang is a cruel and ruthless eunuch who takes over the Emperors ruling power and leads the team of secret agents. After witnessing the atrocities committed by Eunuch Wang, Sergeant Zhao decides to defect but ends up being hunted by his friends, comrades and even his father.

programme.title: Between Tears And Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The Generals henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: Roving Swordsman
programme.desc: An ambitious evil clan intends to rule the martial arts world. To achieve their goal, they must first steal a secret martial arts manuscript depicting how firearms can be produced. However, a supremely intelligent swordsman Shen Sheng Yi is protecting the manuscript and remains one step ahead of the evil clan.

programme.title: Apartment For Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: The Magnificent Swordsman
programme.desc: The Magnificent Swordsman centres on the hero who vows vengeance against evil bandits who killed his family when he was a child. The hero recruits several friends to help the peasants rid their village of marauding bandits, the leader of the band being the man who killed his family.

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husbands playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: The Duel
programme.desc: After knowing his brother has killed the head of a rival triad, Jie takes the blame and was hunted by killers. With the help of Rambler Nan, Jie finally killed his enemies, but then found out that Nan is the one who has killed his father.

programme.desc: Kadamban along with a group of villagers wages a war against a powerful businessman, who wants to destroy the forest surrounding Kadamban's village for his greed.

programme.title: Nachnewale Gaanewale
programme.desc: Two friends sing and dance at functions for a living and decide to get their respective children married to each other. To their dismay, the son refuses to comply.

programme.title: Nachnewale Gaanewale

programme.title: Chori Chori
programme.desc: Khushi, a carefree woman, moves into the house of Ranbir, a businessman, by claiming that she is his fiancee. Ranbir decides to use this to his advantage and make the girl he truly loves jealous.

programme.title: Bazaar
programme.desc: Najma is in love with Akhtar but cannot marry him until he is financially stable. An elderly Shakir promises to help Akhtar set up his business in exchange for Najma finding a suitable bride for him.

programme.title: Welcome
programme.desc: Two thugs meet Rajiv, who belongs to a respectable family, and want to fix their sister's wedding with him. However, when Rajiv's uncle refuses to the match, a series of hilarious situations occur.

programme.title: Nagin Bani Suhagan
programme.desc: Vaishali, an ardent devotee of Lord Shiva, is blessed with a boon to transform herself into a shapeshifting snake. She falls in a dilemma when circumstances force her to go against her own love.

programme.title: Size Zero
programme.desc: An ardent foodie who is overweight decides to join a slimming centre to attract the boy she loves. But she decides to expose the unhealthy practices the management uses to speed up weight loss.

programme.title: Beqabu
programme.desc: Raja helps imprison a terrorist who then murders him. Years later, Raja's girlfriend comes across his lookalike in Nepal and decides to find the truth.

programme.title: Phir Hera Pheri
programme.desc: The lives of Raju, Shyam and Baburao change completely when they get cheated by a fraudster. Now, they must find another way to repay the loan they took from a dreaded gangster.

programme.title: Brothers
programme.desc: David and Monty, estranged half-brothers, train in mixed martial arts to earn a livelihood. However, things change when the two are forced to compete against each other in the final tournament.

programme.title: The Guns Of Navarone
programme.desc: British soldiers are sent on a mission to dismantle two large German guns guarding the Greek island of Navarone and making the evacuation of endangered British troops on a neighboring island impossible.

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: The attempted assassination of the American President is told and re-told from several different perspectives.

programme.title: Made In America
programme.desc: When Zora Mathews goes searching for her biological, anonymous sperm donor father, she and her Afro-centric mother Sarah are dumbfounded to discover Hal Jackson, an obnoxious used car salesman on late-night TV; and worse than that, he's white.

programme.desc: A man presumed dead shows up after six years, but he may be an imposter, and could choose to hang for murder rather than reveal the truth.

programme.title: Enemy At The Gates
programme.desc: Set against the siege of Stalingrad during World War II, this is the epic tale of a young Russian sharpshooter, Vassili, who becomes a legend when a savvy political officer makes him the hero of his propaganda campaign. Their friendship is threatened when both men fall in love with a beautiful female soldier. As the battle for the city rages, Vassili faces his ultimate challenge when the Nazi command dispatches its most elite marksman to hunt down and kill the man who has become the hope of all Russia.

programme.title: Portillo's Andalucia S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Sevilla and Carmona - Michael finishes his Andalucian odyssey in the capital Sevilla and Carmona.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S4 Ep9
programme.desc: In Nepal, heavy snow creates a treacherous situation for trekkers in the Himalayan mountains, when an earthquake triggered avalanche sweeps into a busy base camp. In Pennsylvania, good Samaritans rush to save three children trapped inside a semi-submerged car.

programme.desc: Ben Stiller - World-renowned survivalistBear Gryllsmeets actorBen Stilleron the rugged mountains of the Isle of Skye in Northern Scotland, to go on a once in a lifetime adventure.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - January-February - the Year Begins Ep1
programme.desc: In the early months of the year, the Earths axial tilt brings the height of summer in some places and the depths of winter in others. See how life struggles to survive under these extreme conditions.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Collisions Ep1
programme.desc: Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Connections Ep2
programme.desc: Follow scientists and Traditional Owners as they map out ecological links, migratory pathways, and interspecies bonds that conserve Ningaloos biodiversity. Frolic with whales, float among seaweed islands, and see archaeologists nix a settler myth.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Bound By Blood Ep1
programme.desc: Experience unbelievable acts of courage and loyalty by creatures trying to survive in the remote wilderness of New Zealands South Island. Face forest penguins feast and famine cycles, and explore the tumultuous world of newborn sea lions.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Spring Ep1
programme.desc: Its spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Summer Ep2
programme.desc: Summer brings long, warm days for wildlife to thrive. Watch animals learn new skills, compete for mates, and escape predators as they try to make the most of the short season.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - Wild Fortresses Ep3
programme.desc: In New Zealand, two wild fortresses protect the vulnerable native animals: One a remote island protected by a moat of saltwater, the other a hilltop citadel surrounded by a predator-proof barrier. This is the story of these delicate sanctuaries and the life that thrives within them.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Blood and Dust Ep2

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Herd Mentality Ep2
programme.desc: Many species of animals are adapted to live in large groups. The group gives them protection from predators, helps them find food and offers plenty of social contact. In this episode of Baby Animals we explore whats it like to grow up in some of these groups.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Spring Ep1
programme.desc: Its spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.desc: Summer brings long, warm days for wildlife to thrive. Watch animals learn new skills, compete for mates, and escape predators as they try to make the most of the short season.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Praying for Rain Ep3
programme.desc: Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenixs search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - A Penguin Proposal Ep1
programme.desc: Watch an Antarctic gentoo penguin pop the question with a rocky token of his devotion, then learn how a Madagascar lemur uses toxic millipedes for pest control. Bone up on makeup techniques with a flamingo and meet a honey badger that can pick locks.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - House Hunting Hermit Crabs Ep2
programme.desc: Get in line with hermit crabs for an orderly shell exchange on a Belize beach, then meet a Senegalese chimps pet genet. Float with an otter who swaps hostages for free meals and admire the agricultural prowess of leafcutter ants in the rainforest.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - Ocean Legacy Ep4
programme.desc: Spring on New Zealands east coast is a time of promise for the New Zealand Fur Seal and the Norther Royal Albatross. Theyve returned to their land to breed. But harsh terrain, fickle weather and hungry predators will conspire to make lives difficult for them. Only the strongest will survive to carry forward their legacy.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - March-April - a Time of Renewal Ep2
programme.desc: Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Endangered Species Ep3
programme.desc: Animals that were once near extinction find refuge in the safety of zoos. Celebrate the birth of red pandas, twin snow leopard cubs, a southern white rhino, and a Sulawesi macaque, all species that are endangered in the wild.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - The Inside Story Ep4
programme.desc: Look behind the scenes and meet the innovative teams working to preserve and protect Kenyas wildlife. Check out Save the Elephants radio-tracking-collar system, a drone that monitors wild dog packs, and a local team of Maasai cheetah trackers.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Queen of the Bay Ep6
programme.desc: Chase Anna to the Townies lair, where Mia and her newborn pups are hiding out. See the babies first swimming lessons before the clan moves to new digs, and welcome an era of otter peace as the Mangrove Family becomes a parks main attraction.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - Creepiest Crawlies Ep5
programme.desc: New Zealands isolated islands are famed as an unusual paradise, home to a variety of unique wildlife. Best known for its flightless birds, ancient reptiles and coastal mammals, a closer look reveals another world. A land of miniature monsters, Lilliputian predators and tiny terrors that lead remarkable lives, where every hunter is also the hunted and survival is always a giant struggle. Journey into the undergrowth and discover life on a different scale. From giant carnivorous centipedes and nocturnal crickets to fishing spiders and glowing worms with silken traps. Weird and wonderful, these unsung heroes are Wildest New Zealands Creepiest Crawlies.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - May-June - a Time of Volatility Ep3
programme.desc: Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - A Penguin Proposal Ep1
programme.desc: Watch an Antarctic gentoo penguin pop the question with a rocky token of his devotion, then learn how a Madagascar lemur uses toxic millipedes for pest control. Bone up on makeup techniques with a flamingo and meet a honey badger that can pick locks.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Age of Independence Ep3
programme.desc: The south-eastern coast of New Zealand are some of the richest fishing grounds in the world the place for young marine animals to transition from novices to independent adults. Young whales, dolphins and seals learn to hunt, learn the rules of society, or strike out on their own adventures.

programme.desc: Chase Anna to the Townies lair, where Mia and her newborn pups are hiding out. See the babies first swimming lessons before the clan moves to new digs, and welcome an era of otter peace as the Mangrove Family becomes a parks main attraction.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - Creepiest Crawlies Ep5
programme.desc: New Zealands isolated islands are famed as an unusual paradise, home to a variety of unique wildlife. Best known for its flightless birds, ancient reptiles and coastal mammals, a closer look reveals another world. A land of miniature monsters, Lilliputian predators and tiny terrors that lead remarkable lives, where every hunter is also the hunted and survival is always a giant struggle. Journey into the undergrowth and discover life on a different scale. From giant carnivorous centipedes and nocturnal crickets to fishing spiders and glowing worms with silken traps. Weird and wonderful, these unsung heroes are Wildest New Zealands Creepiest Crawlies.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - A Penguin Proposal Ep1
programme.desc: Watch an Antarctic gentoo penguin pop the question with a rocky token of his devotion, then learn how a Madagascar lemur uses toxic millipedes for pest control. Bone up on makeup techniques with a flamingo and meet a honey badger that can pick locks.

programme.title: In for the Kill
programme.desc: Marvel at the clever ways predators use cunning, agility, and breakneck speed when taking down prey. Witness luring behaviours and see how some killers hide in plain sight, while others put weaponry or chemical warfare to work to bring dinner home.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - The Inside Story Ep4
programme.desc: Look behind the scenes and meet the innovative teams working to preserve and protect Kenyas wildlife. Check out Save the Elephants radio-tracking-collar system, a drone that monitors wild dog packs, and a local team of Maasai cheetah trackers.

programme.desc: Gallipoli - Gino is in the city of Gallipoli. He joins a diver on her small boat as they head to the sea caves. She forages for red oysters which they eat with a glass of rose. Gino heads into town and tries out Scapece, a dish of fish in saffron and of religious significance in the city. Inspired by the the saffron and fresh fish, Gino demonstrates the Puglian classic Tiella, the Italian answer to paella, made with mussels, rice and potatoes.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep23
programme.desc: Wheres The Party? / The Noisiest Night - When Marcus loses an invitation to a birthday party and doesnt know where it will take place, the Dew Drops set out to find the location and get Marcus to the party on time. / When Harper cant sleep because of a strange noise in her room, the Dews must figure out the source.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep16
programme.desc: Divewings - When sea-dwelling dragons called Divewings start attacking ships near the island, the Rescue Riders have to find out what's making them so upset.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep31
programme.desc: Love Gauntlet - King Julien tries to get rid of his parents, but when evil Karl traps them in the Love Gauntlet they must prove their family's strength to survive.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep32
programme.desc: The Jungle Games - After making a bet against Uncle King Julien, King Julien must win the "Jungle Games" in order to maintain control of the royal crown.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep31
programme.desc: Lucky and the Rough Ride - The PALs join AI and Javier on a mustang drive, but when Javier gets injured, its up to Lucky and Spirit to get him to safety

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep32
programme.desc: Lucky and the Ghostly Gotcha! - When Snips claims not to be afraid of ghosts, the PALs decide to give him a fun Halloween scare hell never forget!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep12
programme.desc: Pet Sitters / Narwhalicorn Day - Kelp and Scallop pet-sit Crabby, who acts out until they realize hes missing home. / Kelp feels like he cant choose between a celebration on land or under the sea. So he attempts to do both... at the same time!

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep21
programme.desc: The Fly-A-Long / Unburied Treasure - When the Dews' Glitter Guide, Willow comes to check on the Dews progress, they feel like theyre failing to impress her, until Lola gets locked out of the apartment during a game of Hide-and-Seek and Dews work together to get her back inside. / When the Dew Drops discover a time capsule in the park, they set out to find the mystery owner.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep35
programme.desc: Zero Dunk Thunky / Pie Vs Pie - Thunk is captured by the Broods and develops feelings for Blurg /At the Valley's food competition, Thunk and Ugga mistakenly make a new hit food

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep36
programme.desc: Super Smash Siblings / A Hole In Grug - Eep and Thunk compete against their classmates in Ahhh-Smashin/After being denied a spot on the Valley's Wall of Fame, Grug creates a new game

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Frenzied Farts of Flabby Flabulous - George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep2
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Dreadful Debacle of DJ Drowsy Drawers - George and Harold attempt to save the fun at their school dance, but matters are made worse when their music teachers transforms into the dull yet deadly villain DJ Drowsy Drawers

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep3
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Horrible Hostilities of the Homework Hydra - When George and Harold go back in time to stop the invention of homework, they realize they also eliminated the most important thing in the world: comic books

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep57
programme.desc: War of the Cheeks - Boss searches for evidence that Tabitha's best friend is an Uncuddleable, but is sidetracked by a Templeton Family tradition: "The War of the Cheeks", a Go Fish tournament where the winner gets to make family rules for a whole day. When Yvette joins in, Boss has to keep her from winning, out of fear that an evil babysitter will make family rules that overturn the Templeton household.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep58
programme.desc: Techy Tykes - Trying to win Tabitha's loyalty for Baby Corp, Boss and Tina invite her to Techy Tykes, a technology convention at their office. But when the top-secret UBO goes missing, the outsiders Tabitha and Tim (who's tagged along to relive his glory days) immediately become the number one suspects.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep59
programme.desc: Birthday Blues - Missing his old life on his birthday, Boss tries to have a full-fledged grown-up celebration in Chicago, but Carol is the only one able to chauffeur and take care of him. The two battle at every stop of the birthday party tour, but when Boss's old work nemesis sets him up for an Federal Investigation Sting at an improv comedy show, Boss and Carol are forced to work together to escape the law.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep19
programme.desc: The Battle(s) of Gongmen Bay - Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep20
programme.desc: Gongmen City Hustle - Po and the Kids make it to Gongmen City in search of the contact they heard has some info on the dirigible crash. Meanwhile, Xiao, mourning the presumed death of her new panda friends, takes off into the woods and meets a new friend.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep21
programme.desc: Night of the White Bone Demon - In a giant sea battle, Po and the Kids manage to escape the pursuing police to make it to Volcano island and get some answers. Empress Xiao begins learning how to defend herself.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep46
programme.desc: Queen of the Castle/Truth or Dare - Poppy attempts to complete her Dads abandoned plans for the greatest sand castle of all time. Unfortunately, she didnt take the tides into consideration. Now shes in a battle with the ocean to preserve the precious castle!/When playing truth or dare, Biggie always chooses truth. But when he notices that this makes the game less fun for his friends, he strives to become the sort of Troll who could pull off a dare.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep47
programme.desc: Friend Matching/Trolly Tales 3 - When a friend-matching quiz Poppy surreptitiously gives the Trolls reveals that Sky and Guy are a near perfect match, she sets out to make them friends! But her attempts to foster a relationship keep backfiring./Branch and Poppy try to entertain Trolls Villages babies with a series of nursery rhymes. But, stalling for time, they expand each into a distinct, Trolls-y story.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep48
programme.desc: Apple of My Ire/Funsgiving - After all their adventures, Branch no longer finds Cloud Guy as annoying as he once did. But to Cloud Guy, this is an unacceptable betrayal of their adversarial relationship. Dejected, he sets out to find a new rival to annoy./Biggie is hosting Funsgiving this year, and is therefore charged with preparing all of the best dishes for his friends. But in his quest to make things perfect, he goes a little too far

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep5
programme.desc: Boov Flu Blues / Get Me To The Gorg - Oh comes down with the Boov Flu and Tip accidentally turns him into a flu monster Tip help out all his friends when they freeze into Boovsicles./Tip and Oh take off on a space road trip to see the Gorg Babies.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep7
programme.desc: Big Boy/ Blackbeard - Sherman brings back a giant man baby after he loses a neighbor's son in the WABAC; Blackbeard battles a bully pirate to get his mojo and beard back

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep31
programme.desc: The Journey - A paladinis trapped in a distant Galra outpost

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep57
programme.desc: Too Many Cats - A myriad of Puss clones pour forth from the portal, each with a different personality, until eventually an evil twin shows up to challenge the real Puss

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep31
programme.desc: Treasure Of The Sierra Marty/Big Baby - Chet, Skidmark and Smoove Move bring swamp toad Marty on an adventure; The snails fumble taking care of a lost human child left at the taco stand.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep61
programme.desc: Pip's Playground - Pip is feeling bored and wants something new to play. Fifi has a brilliant idea and asks all the tots to help her build a playground for Pip as a surprise.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep9
programme.desc: The Case Of Deltoid's Strange Behaviour - Smartysaurus is upset because her best friend, Deltoid, keeps calling her a monster and running away from her. Noddy decides to investigate and find out why Deltoid's behaving so strangely. He soon discovers that Deltoid has lost all his memories and doesn't recognise any of his friends anymore. It takes all Noddy's powers of deduction and gathering evidence on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet to realise that Deltoid has lost his memory chip! All he has to do now is stop Deltoid trying to trap Smartysaurus long enough to refit the chip and restore his memories. Good luck Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep62
programme.desc: Mud Sculptures - It has been raining and the garden is muddy. The tots decide to make mud sculptures. But what will they all do with the sculptures when they are finished?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep10
programme.desc: The Case Of The Slippery Stage - Pat-Pat is meant to be giving a baton twirling display at the Town Hall but the stage is covered with sticky stuff. Clockwork Mouse and Carlton can clear up the sticky stuff but Noddy must investigate to find out who was trying to spoil Pat-Pat's show or they might do it again! Using his wwwbook to follow all the clues from polishing day at the Fairy Castle to Fairy Coco swapping the polish for a ribbon, Noddy works out it was Pat-Pat who tried to delay her show. She wanted to practise more! Noddy and Bumpy help Pat-Pat to feel confident about the performance and she gives a great display. Thanks, Noddy!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep9
programme.desc: Horse Powered Dinkie - Farmer Green tells the cars about olden days, when the only transport was horse and cart. Maxi and Drifter say they would never be seen travelling that slow or would they?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep10
programme.desc: FB's Sleepover - FB is excited about his sleepover with the other cars in the workshop but when the night draws in he is unsure of his unfamiliar surroundings. Big Chris helps set him at his ease

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep9
programme.desc: Why Monkeys Swing In The Trees - You see there was a time when Monkey used to play on the ground and he loved to wind up Crocodile. One day the Big Rains came and Monkey got stranded up the Mango Tree. Nasty Crocodile promised to take him to dry land. But only in exchange for one thing. His HEART! Monkey tricked Crocodile and when Crocodile found out that Monkey swapped his heart for a measley mango, he chased Monkey up a tree. From that day on Monkey swings in the trees keeping well clear of Crocodiles angry snaps! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep10
programme.desc: Why Tickbird Sits On Hippos Back - You see there was a time when Tickbird didn't sit on Hippo's back, infact they weren't friends at all! Tickbird was sick of Hippo splashing all the time. One day tiny Tickbird challenges big Hippo to a contest who can drink the most water in a single gulp! Tickbird outwits Hippo by using the tides and from that day she is allowed to sit on Hippo's back and pick off all the yummy ticks she can eat! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep3
programme.desc: You (Don't) Snooze, You Lose / Save The Squasher - When the crew takes on a mission to help Ian get some rest for a Badminton Tournament, Jax realises that the biggest approach isn't always the best approach. / When Lula loses her comic book, Ari learns that the best heroes rely on teamwork and not gadgets.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep17
programme.desc: Happy Birthday Pawston - Tag and Scooch embark on a road trip to Chew York City to track down Kelly Korgi to ask her to perform at Pawstons 100th birthday party.\ When Kelly Korgi tells Tag she cant perform at Pawstons 100th birthday party, she and Scooch decide to create a Kelly Korgi replacement so that she doesnt break her promise to the town.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep69
programme.desc: Puss In Book - While out fighting off ninja pirates, Puss stumbles on a fairy tale book. When he opens it, the adventure begins, as the viewer must choose each outcome, eventually freeing Puss from the book.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep21
programme.desc: Plushythingy - When Frederic Estes creates the cutest plushy ever that is the hottest toy in town, the field team must destroy the last remaining one but are powerless against its cuteness

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep62
programme.desc: The Great Medieval London Fire 1135 - Boss Baby and Tina reject the 5%er system that says the cuter you are, the more love you deserve. Teaming up with the Uncuddleables, the team tries to take down the system from within, forming a resistance of the eight department heads of Baby Corp in the hopes of changing the way we look at Baby Love forever.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep69
programme.desc: Loyal Order Of Ingerman - After learning that his ancestors once hunted dragons Fishlegs goes out on a journey to find a Dramillion dragon while being faced with the challenge to clear his family name.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep69
programme.desc: Tears In The Drain - When Detective King Julien searches for a missing Butterfish he notices lemurs acting strange all around and realizes he has a serious mystery on his hands so he must get the Mystery Solving Team back together

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep9
programme.desc: Message in a Bubble / Glitteretti - Kelp has a new trick with his bubbles: he can have his friends put voice messages inside that you hear when you pop them. But when Pixie decides she doesnt want the others to hear whats in her bubble, the chase is on to rescue it! / Juniper is devastated when the traditional ceremony to celebrate her next level of spark achievement cant happen. Kelp helps introduce a new tradition.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep24
programme.desc: Escape The Backpack / Play Date - While helping Lola pack for her first day of camp, the Dews get stuck inside her backpack! Using the random items inside, the Dews get crafty in their attempt to break out. / When Eden and Phoebe join Harper and Marcus for a playdate, the Dews disagree on what activity their kids should do, ultimately learning that there are lots of ways to play!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep17
programme.desc: Mecha-Menace - Magnus and Axel unveil their new "mechano-dragon." It's impressive at first, but the Riders set out to prove it's no better than a bucket of bolts.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep3
programme.desc: You (Don't) Snooze, You Lose / Save The Squasher - When the crew takes on a mission to help Ian get some rest for a Badminton Tournament, Jax realises that the biggest approach isn't always the best approach. / When Lula loses her comic book, Ari learns that the best heroes rely on teamwork and not gadgets.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep17

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep10
programme.desc: Talent Show / Sad Sad Plant - Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. But when it comes time, Scallop wants to keep the song just for them, leaving Kelp to come up with anew act- and fast! / The kids all visit the magical musical plant greenhouse on Unicorn Land. They each pick a plant to take care of, and for Kelp its a sad, almost dead plant that he falls in love with.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep25
programme.desc: Flying High / Nest Sweet Nest - Marcus makes a Dew Drop-sized hot-air balloon for Phoebe and the Dews have a blast helping their kids from above, including secretly guiding Lola back to her family, before she accidentally follows Hip-Hop the frog out of the park. / Phoebe makes a pair of glasses for Bob the bird, but when seeing things clearly for the first time gets him lost, the Dews help Bob find his nest before his family arrives for a visit.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep17
programme.desc: Mecha-Menace - Magnus and Axel unveil their new "mechano-dragon." It's impressive at first, but the Riders set out to prove it's no better than a bucket of bolts.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep33
programme.desc: Close Encounters Of The Mort Kind - When Mort is abducted by "aliens", King Julien teams with Clover, Maurice and Hector to investigate why he's not the one being abducted.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep34
programme.desc: The Butterfly War - King Julien declares a war against butterflies to raise his kingdom's spirit, but when the village is destroyed he decides to hold a peace summit.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep33
programme.desc: Lucky and the Doomed Delivery - Lucky, Spirit and the PALs journey to deliver a very special wedding invitation, but they have a surprise waiting when they arrive

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep34
programme.desc: Lucky and the Doubtful Drought - When Grayson has the only working well during an unexpected heat wave, Lucky has to find an alternate source of water

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep13
programme.desc: Sea Monsters / Puff Fruit - Rumors of scary sea monsters in the East End take the kids on a journey of discovering you shouldnt believe everything you hear. / Mysterious globs disturbing the ocean turn out to be the byproduct of food from Unicorn Land.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep22
programme.desc: Tooth on the Loose / That Thing You Dew - When Phoebe convinces the Tooth Fairy to visit before Marcus has actually lost his tooth, the Dew Drops do everything in their power to make sure the tooth is out before she arrives! / The Dews decide to hold a concert in the park for their animal friends, but cant find the time to practice.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep37
programme.desc: Bait With Destiny / Sappy Together - Eep gets jealous when Thunk is invited to join the hunters/Grug and Gran must work together after getting stuck to each other with sticky tree sap

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep38
programme.desc: Scare Tactics / Disturbiahhh! - Grug has Thunk use "scare tactics" to get the Valley to defend against the Broods/Eep thinks Snoot is holding Ahhh! Valleyites captive in his cave

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harolds latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep5
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Terrifying Perilous Misfortune of the T.P. Mummy - After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep6
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Squishy Predicament of Stanley Peet's Stinky Pits - When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep60
programme.desc: Sitting Ducks - Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep61
programme.desc: The Big Dumpling - The Uncuddleables have struck the Lil Dumpling baby pageant, replacing all of Baby Corp's super-cute top 5%er babies with not-cute bottom 5%ers. Boss, Tina and their field team race to caravan the 5%ers from their homes to the pageant before Nannycam deploys the nuclear option of unleashing the dangerously cute UBO on stage to salvage a Lil Dumpling win.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep22
programme.desc: Rise of the Empress - On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out what's really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep23
programme.desc: Bridge Over Troubled Lava - The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep24
programme.desc: House of Flying Pandas - The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep49
programme.desc: Bunker Break-In/To Catch a Critter - When Branch loses to Poppy at Capture the Flag, he challenges her to break into his bunker and steal Gary, to prove her abilities. Poppy organizes a whacky heist with the help of the Snack Pack. /When Smidge accidentally loses some of the critters Milton cares for, she must try and retrieve them from Trolls Forest.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep50
programme.desc: CJ Wooferbug/What Did I Miss - DJ is excited to give her niece CJ her own wooferbug for her birthday. But the wooferbug proves difficult to transport across Trolls Village. Will DJ be able to get it to CJ before CJs birthday party ends?/When Peppy takes an entire day to get a new haircut, he asks Poppy to fill him in on what he missed. What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep51
programme.desc: Tall Tail/BFFF - Creek arrives at a Trolls potluck empty-handed, explaining that a strange creature ate the fondue he meant to bring. The Trolls nod sympathetically, but Branch alone doesnt believe this clearly made-up story. He sets out to prove Creek is a liar./ Branch presents Trolls Village with a time capsule which will survive the ages. The Trolls are excited by the prospect of making friends with future Trolls. Now if only they could agree what should actually go in the time capsule.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harolds latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep5
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Terrifying Perilous Misfortune of the T.P. Mummy - After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep6
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Squishy Predicament of Stanley Peet's Stinky Pits - When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep60
programme.desc: Sitting Ducks - Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep61
programme.desc: The Big Dumpling - The Uncuddleables have struck the Lil Dumpling baby pageant, replacing all of Baby Corp's super-cute top 5%er babies with not-cute bottom 5%ers. Boss, Tina and their field team race to caravan the 5%ers from their homes to the pageant before Nannycam deploys the nuclear option of unleashing the dangerously cute UBO on stage to salvage a Lil Dumpling win.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep62
programme.desc: The Great Medieval London Fire 1135 - Boss Baby and Tina reject the 5%er system that says the cuter you are, the more love you deserve. Teaming up with the Uncuddleables, the team tries to take down the system from within, forming a resistance of the eight department heads of Baby Corp in the hopes of changing the way we look at Baby Love forever.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep22
programme.desc: Rise of the Empress - On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out what's really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep23
programme.desc: Bridge Over Troubled Lava - The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep24

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep245
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Pig - Peppa and her family borrow Grandpa Pigs boat for a day on the river. Daddy Pig is the captain, Peppa, George and Mummy Pig are the crew. When the boat gets stuck in some long reeds. Daddy Pig has to use all his strength to push the boat free.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep246
programme.desc: The Quarrel - Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep248
programme.desc: Bouncy Ball - Peppa and George are playing in the garden with their bouncy ball when Suzy Sheep turns up with two tennis rackets. She uses the bouncy ball to play a game of tennis with Peppa, making George feel left out. Will the job of ball boy cheer him up?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep106
programme.desc: We Love Nature - Anna and her friends are planning an amazing picnic in nature. But Bubu's bag is too heavy, Christophe can't resist eating all the strawberries! A thunder makes things worse. Luckily, Anna's living room makes a great camp site!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep107
programme.desc: The Kite - While Anna and Froga are playing with their kite, it gets stuck in the tree. Anna and Froga race to Ron's for help, but when the three friends arrive at the apple tree, their kite and all the apples are missing!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Popcorn / Banana - Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone! // Tiny Chef makes banana toast but after squishing his perfect banana, has to create a brand new dish!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep321
programme.desc: Paddington's Earth Day Mission / Paddington's Special Spring Harvest Celebration - It'd Earth Day and Paddington has the important job of planting a tree, but will he find the perfect spot before it is too late? // Baaz holds a Spring Harvest Festival, and everyone enjoys bringing their own celebration along.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep317
programme.desc: Paddington and the Unlikely Hero - Who's the mystery hero doing good deeds in Windsor Gardens and why do they want to remain anonymous?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep502
programme.desc: The Trophy Chase - The Championship Race is about to start, and all the fastest trucks in town are ready to roll! But when Crusher steals the trophy before the race even begins, it's up to Blaze and his friends to get it back in time.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep823
programme.desc: Pups Save the Floating Goodways / Pups Save the Portable Pet Wash - The Goodways drift out to sea on a swan shaped float and need rescued from a flock of real swans aiming to protect the giant inflatable. // Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and ends up causing bubble trouble all over town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep824
programme.desc: Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus / Pups Save the Hummy Gummies - Wally the Walrus searches all over Adventure Bay for Cap'n Turbot and turns the town upside-down in the process. // Everybody loves Helga Humdinger's Hummy Gummy treats, causing Mayor Humdinger to get jealous and steal them all.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep203
programme.desc: The Crew Builds a Mini Golf Course - When a family of bunnies hops onto the soccer field, Rubble & Crew use their skills to build a new sport... Bunny Ball!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep202
programme.desc: The Crew Builds a Sierra Sparkle Sign - Popstar Sierra Sparkle is moving to Builder Cove! But when the pups plan a surprise greeting, Speed Meister makes a plan of his own.

programme.desc: Spotlight on East Asia, a region steeped in history and now helping to write the future of our world. We'll break down the key stories and explain why they matter.

programme.title: Life, Unexpected Ep4
programme.desc: Living With Hope - What are the dreams of young patients with serious illnesses who face uncertain futures? For the caregivers at Star PALS, how do they persevere through the heartbreaking reality of losing patients?

programme.title: Asia Tonight
programme.desc: CNA correspondents bring you the top stories of the day with 'live' reports and interviews to keep you up-to-date on the day's events.

programme.title: An Unequal Heatwave
programme.desc: Amid a record heatwave, we follow affluent and poor families in Mumbai, Manila and Bangkok to see how means and access impact ability to cope. What solutions are needed to deal with future heatwaves?

programme.title: Singapore Tonight
programme.desc: From business to politics, health to technology, the latest news from Singapore and analysis of the impact.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1801
programme.desc: British Invasion - Its a British invasion of the world-famous Octagon as the top stars from across the pond show off their incredible skills on UFC Unleashed. Featuring Tom Aspinall, Meatball Molly McCann, and Paddy The Baddy Pimblett.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC284MakhachevvsVolkanovski
programme.desc: At UFC 284, featherweight king Alexander Volkanovski sought a new challenge and a second belt by challenging lightweight champion Islam Makhachev. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their title bout on UFC Main Event.

programme.title: LALIGA LEGENDS PEP GUARDIOLA
programme.desc: LALIGA LEGENDS PEP GUARDIOLA - More than a title-winning machine, Pep Guardiola changed the face of football. Trace the evolution of his famed tiki-taka style of play that propelled the likes of Messi, Xavi, Iniesta and Busquets to footballing royalty.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC293AdesanyavsStrickland
programme.desc: After regaining his title with a satisfying knockout of Alex Pereira, UFC middleweight champion Israel Adesanya defends his crown against hungry challenger Sean Strickland, who has won eight of his last ten bouts. Plus, heavyweight knockout artist Tai Tuivasa collides with Alexander Volkov. See all this and much more on UFC Reloaded

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep2
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep25
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1004TeixeiravsProchazka
programme.desc: UFC 275 featured Czech MMA star Jiri Prochazka in his third Octagon outing as he sought UFC gold against newly minted light heavyweight champion, Glover Teixeira. Relive their fight with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Submissions
programme.desc: Debuts - Earning a submission victory inside the famed UFC Octagon takes skills and talent that few possess. UFC Ultimate Submissions brings you a collection of the greatest grappling finishes the MMA world has ever seen.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC284MakhachevvsVolkanovski
programme.desc: At UFC 284, featherweight king Alexander Volkanovski sought a new challenge and a second belt by challenging lightweight champion Islam Makhachev. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their title bout on UFC Main Event.

programme.title: MotoGP - Emilia-Romagna Grand Prix Highlights
programme.desc: MotoGP - Emilia-Romagna Grand Prix Highlights - There are at least fifteen riders across all three classes who call the circuit their home, starting with the nine-time World Champion Valentino Rossi. Now, there are even some of the youngest riders on the grid who travel no more than a handful of kilometres to the circuit. Thats all thanks to the track becoming a reference point for training and testing throughout the year for riders.

programme.title: 2023-2024 KOVO V-League Women - Rd6 - Hillstate vs IBK Altos EpRd6
programme.desc: Hillstate vs IBK Altos - The 20th season of the KOVO V-League Women sees reigning champions EX Hi-pass defend their title against six fellow professional volleyball teams for the coveted championship in South Korea.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 SAVES
programme.desc: SERIE A TOP 10 SAVES - Ridiculous reflexes from Vicario, Onana & Maignan. 10 of the best saves from the 22/23 Serie A season.

programme.desc: Prelims - UFC returns to Paris for the third consecutive year with an exhilarating matchup between lightweight contenders as #11 Renato Moicano and #12 Benot Saint Denis square off. In a clash of middleweight contenders, #4 Nassourdine Imavov steps into the Octagon to face #8 Brendan Allen.
